response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. It's a valuable asset that offers a wide range of benefits, tailored specifically to enhance your experience. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. For you, the product holds an estimated value of $80. Given this, I would like to extend you an exclusive offer to acquire it for $100. This price reflects a thoughtful balance between the product's true value and your perceived worth, aiming to ensure both parties benefit. I trust this proposal aligns with your expectations and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 100}
